game.edge-label: Operation between row {{n1.row, zero-indicing}} / column {{n1.column, zero-indicing}} and row {{n2.row, zero-indicing}} / column {{n2.column, zero-indicing}}

tutorial.0-start-path: Click and hold a number in the grid to start a path.
tutorial.1-extend-path: Move to an adjacent number to add it to the path.
tutorial.2-find-objective: Find a path that computes to {{value}}. There may be multiple solutions.
tutorial.3-release-path: Release your mouse to advance to the next objective.
tutorial.4-solve-objectives: Solve all remaining objectives. If you're stuck, you can always restart the level.
tutorial.5-perfect-game: Try to get a perfect game by having numbers left over at the end. This may not always be possible.

hints.title: Get a Hint
hints.warning: This level will not count towards your statistics if solved with a hint.
hints.no-stats: This level does not count towards the statistics as it was solved with a hint.
hints.button: Get a hint for the active objective

share.title: Share Level
share.error-invalid-generator-version: This level has been generated in an older version and is no longer compatible.
share.error-unknown: The provided level appears to be malformed. Please double-check the URL.

overwrite.title: Overwrite active game?
overwrite.warning: You already have an active game. If you continue, it will be lost.
